name: Path to Oshun (Alpha)
description:
Play as Sona, a young black woman going through a journey of self-reflection and discovery. 3D Action-Exploration made in Unreal Engine 4. 

Instructions: The attached video is an opening cinematic for the game, which will be implemented soon, so please watch this before playing. The build is compatible with Windows, using a mouse & keyboard or a controller. Using a controller might be a bit buggy still! To play, download the zip and extract it. Inside the PathtoOshun folder you'll find "PathtoOshun.exe", click that and the game should open.

Feedback: This game is still in development so any feedback you have would be appreciated. Please take 10 minutes to fill out this feedback form! Path to Oshun is being developed by a group of masters students at University of California, Santa Cruz. If you have questions please feel free to leave comments here or send us an email at pathtooshun@gmail.com.
